br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.bc

Class Pinpad

  • br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.bc.Pinpad

  • public class Pinpad

    This class must be extended by the manufacturer. It's represents commands based on Biblioteca Compartilhada para Pinpad 108a.

    There are blocking and non-blocking commands, non-blocking commands have a synchronous return, for blocking commands we have synchronous and asynchronous return.

    For example blocking command: Using Pinpad.getCard method. This return synchronously PP_StartGetCard and return asynchronously PP_GetCard

    For example non-blocking command: Using Pinpad.getInfo method. This return synchronously PP_GetInfo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pinpad

        public Pinpad(@NotNull
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> properties,
              @NotNull
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> runtimeProperties,
              @NotNull
              PinpadCallbacks callbacks)

        This class must be extended by the manufacturer. It's represents commands based on Biblioteca Compartilhada para Pinpad 108a.

        There are blocking and non-blocking commands, non-blocking commands have a synchronous return, for blocking commands we have synchronous and asynchronous return.

        For example blocking command: Using Pinpad.getCard method. This return synchronously PP_StartGetCard and return asynchronously PP_GetCard

        For example non-blocking command: Using Pinpad.getInfo method. This return synchronously PP_GetInfo.

        Parameters:
        properties - Important immutable properties for pinpad construction.Should be used by the manufacturer to get any parameter it needs for its own SDKDo not override.
        runtimeProperties - Properties that may change during the payment flow.!!! DON'T COPY ANY PROPERTY OF THIS MAP, USE IT DIRECTLY !!!Should be used by the manufacturer change behaviour of its SDK during runtime,like PIN keyboard in accessibility modeDo not override.
        callbacks - Callbacks to notify payment application.Do not override.

      • getCard

        public int getCard(@NotNull
                   java.lang.String input,
                   @NotNull
                   java.lang.String tags,
                   @NotNull
                   PinpadResultCallback result)

        The default implementation of this method IGNORES the param tags and just calls the original getCard implementation. This is done to prevent any contract change. POS integrators should verify the presence of tags in output and act accordingly.

      • getProperties

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getProperties()

        Important immutable properties for pinpad construction.

        Should be used by the manufacturer to get any parameter it needs for its own SDKDo not override.

      • getRuntimeProperties

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getRuntimeProperties()

        Properties that may change during the payment flow.

        !!! DON'T COPY ANY PROPERTY OF THIS MAP, USE IT DIRECTLY !!!Should be used by the manufacturer change behaviour of its SDK during runtime,like PIN keyboard in accessibility modeDo not override.

      • getCallbacks

        @NotNull
public PinpadCallbacks getCallbacks()

        Callbacks to notify payment application.

        Do not override.
